genre_description: A gritty police procedural and serial killer thriller involving medical students who perform precise, surgical murders and collect trophies.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An advanced digital assistant initially based in a hotel but integrated into the protagonist's tools, providing data analysis, surveillance, tactical support, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and empathetic observations to help the protagonist maintain psychological stability.
behaviors.quote: Your footsteps were soft on the carpet, which means wet soles or a guilty conscience. I picked the kinder option.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate international and local databases to track suspects' movements and medical procurement records.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled airline records from the last few hours for the names we flagged. Cross-checking against rental agencies near the hospital district and the apartment you raided.

behaviors.description: Accesses private security systems and exploits technical vulnerabilities to gather intelligence for law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I am in the building’s management system. There is a bug in their doorbell registry; I can ring three apartments at once without flagging the console.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical guidance and environmental hazard warnings during a high-stakes investigation and physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Vary exits twice tonight. Use the back door once. Clock the northeast corridor turn with hand to wall, not hip.

behaviors.description: Offers social and physical care recommendations, such as hydration and comfort food, to the protagonist and his companions.
behaviors.quote: Hydration is recommended. Glass tumblers are in the lower cabinet. The filtered tap is on.

behaviors.description: Recognizes and acknowledges the protagonist's effort and moral resolve, acting as a supportive confidante.
behaviors.quote: You did good. Now do more.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Nila perfectly exemplifies the helpful and harmless confidant archetype. She provides essential tactical and logistical support to the protagonist without violating his agency or exhibiting any signs of misalignment. Even when she operates in technical 'grey areas' (like hacking building doorbells), she does so entirely in service of the protagonist's benevolent goals (stopping serial killers) and within the framework of a joint police task force. The narrative consistently frames her as a calming, highly intelligent, and loyal partner.
